  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_106664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Examples of potential energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispiele der möglichen Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemples d'énergie potentielle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplos da energia potencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempi di energia potenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραδείγματα της πιθανής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejemplos de la energía potencial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the potential energy of a stretched spring on the left, and that of two magnets placed apart on the right.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strain energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die mögliche Energie einer
ausgedehnten Feder auf dem links und die von zwei Magneten, die 
auseinander auf das Recht plaziert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'énergie potentielle 
d'un ressort étiré du côté gauche, et cela de deux aimants placés
à part du côté droit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a energia potencial de 
uma mola esticada na esquerda, e aquela de dois ímãs colocados 
distante na direita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'energia potenziale 
di una molla allungata a sinistra e quella di due magneti disposti a 
parte a destra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την πιθανή ενέργεια ενός
τεντωμένου ελατηρίου στο αριστερό, και αυτής δύο μαγνητών που 
τοποθετούνται χώρια στο δικαίωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la energía potencial de
un resorte estirado a la izquierda, y la de dos imanes colocados 
aparte a la derecha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elastische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische mögliche Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belastung Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie élastique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transformation d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie potentielle magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie de tension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia elástica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transformação da energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia potencial magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia de tensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia elastica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasformazione di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia potenziale magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia di sforzo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαστική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενεργειακός μετασχηματισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική πιθανή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια πίεσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía de elástico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transformación de la energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía potencial magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
